m_descr: Publishes the status of devices to a MQTT topic and is able to set values based on subscribed topics.
client_id_randomize_helper: Only needed for some MQTT brokers
topic_postfix_status_helper: Publish an empty message to the status-topic of a device to force a publication of the status
topic_postfix_set_label: Topic postfix for setting the value
topic_postfix_set_helper: Publish a message to the set-topic of a device to set it's value
ignore_helper: Uncheck this to send MQTT message on all events not only when value has changed
publications_helper: Configure for which devices the status will be published to a MQTT topic
tags_helper: All devices with this tag will be used
topic_helper: You can use %deviceId%, %deviceName% and %roomName% to get those automatically filled in. The names will camel cased.
